reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Campaign for Self Rule and Land Rights of Tribal Communities

description.narrative: The project is implemented by a state level network of organisations and community based groups working for the rights and welfare of adivasi communities. The project aims at obtaining title deeds for forest dependent tribal families according to the Fores t Rights Act of 2006 and the Direction of the High Court. The demands Tamil Nadu Government for implementation of the 5th Schedule according to the Indian Constitution and also the Panchayat Raj Extension Act for Scheduled Areas as per the Direction of the President of India and National Adivasi Advisory Committee. It lobbies with state and Central government, banks, public undertakings and tribal welfare departments for extending economic and technical assistance for tribal communities for cultivating the legally acquired forest lands. Additionally, it creates awareness about the climate change trends among the tribal communities and involve them in addressing the issue in their own way and lobby with the state government to give priority and easy subsidy t o non conventional systems of energy production and organic methods of cultivation.
